mapper.select: select s.id, s.category_id, s.name, s.price, s.status, s.description, s.image, s.update_time, c.name as category_name, sd.id as setmeal_dish_id, sd.setmeal_id, sd.dish_id, sd.name as setmeal_dish_name, sd.price as setmeal_dish_price, sd.copies from setmeal s left join category c on s.category_id = c.id left join setmeal_dish sd on s.id = sd.setmeal_id where s.id = #{id} and s.status = 1
